title: Pool sharks
creator_credit: Edwin Middleton, Essex Films and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: W.C. Fields’ first film displaying his prowess at the pool table; rivals for the same girl find that a “friendly” game does not help to settle the matter. A useful comparison with later films in terms of the development of character, history of comedy and the role of women. Written by W.C. Fields and musical score by Stuart Oderman.
